item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - VA — Milk & Sugar Beach Sessions 2025
item.description:
​


Artist: Milk & Sugar
Title: Beach Sessions 2025
Label: Milk & Sugar Recordings
Catalog: MSRCD107
Released: 22.08.2025
Type: Compilation
Genre: Electronic, Chillout, Disco, Nu-Disco, Downtempo, House, Deep House

Tracklist

1. Chasing Kurt – Let It Run [Momo Khani & Meindel Remake] (05:43)
2. T.Markakis – A Beautiful Day [Extended Mix] (04:51)
3. ColorJaxx – In Unity [Extended Mix] (06:10)
4. Casanovy – I Need Your Lovin’ [Momo Khani & Meindel Remake] (07:36)
5. Ariel R – Narbus [Extended Mix] (05:40)
6. Roni Iron – Inside My Head [Extended Mix] (05:28)
7. Kurtz – Stars at Night [Extended Mix] (05:57)
8. Chanknous – Finding Shells [Extended Mix] (07:49)
9. Hollistic – Tell Me What You Want [Extended Mix] (05:28)
10. Lee Walker & Brent Anthony – Take It Back [Extended Mix] (04:50)
11. Sandy Rivera, Aruhtra, Deeprule & Annabella – My Rose [Deep Extended Mix] (04:44)
12. Lello Russo, Sabatino S & Venessa Jackson – Dos and Don’ts [Sebb Junior Extended Remix] (06:08)
13. Yves Murasca & Rosario Galati – Be Sure to Let Go [Sebb Junior Extended Remix] (05:56)
14. Milk & Sugar & Lizzy Pattinson – Let the Sun Shine [Chrissi D! Remix] (07:51)
15. Marco Bartolucci – That Night [Extended Mix] (06:18)
16. Abyss Deep Sound Lab, Roxanne Myles & Lowkeytheory – Heal Our World [Yves Murasca Beach Vibe] (04:26)
17. Deep Dive Corp. & Hippiehaus – Hey! (02:22)
18. T.Markakis – Feelings [Extended Mix] (05:02)
19. Pearldiver – Science & Passion (03:18)
20. Worldtraveller – The Field (02:52)
21. James Bright & Rachel Lloyd – Through the Night (05:01)
22. Schwarz & Funk & Melon Monkey Club – Ojo del Sol [Extended Version] (05:29)
23. Pit Baumgartner & Jeanne Crémer – Un Baiser À La Fois (03:40)
24. Living Room – Summerlove (04:02)
25. DMH – Monday Morning (06:06)
26. Milk & Sugar – Let the Sun Shine [Mathieu & Florzinho Extended Remix] (05:19)
27. KAPARD – Gold Rush [Extended Mix] (05:18)
28. Deep Dive Corp. – Sister [P.M.Fm’s Less Is More Remake] (08:52)
29. Hazy J – Silver (06:08)
30. De-Phazz – The Mambo Craze [DJ Cam Remix] (04:17)

31. Milk & Sugar – Beach Sessions 2025 [Pool Session] (01:19:18)
32. Milk & Sugar – Beach Sessions 2025 [Beach Session] (01:07:36)

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Marina Sena - De Primeira [Apple Music Dolby Atmos]
item.description:
Hi, everyone!

Can someone please rip the Dolby Atmos version of Marina Sena's debut album "De Primeira" only available on Apple Music?

Thanks in advance <3



Link: https://music.apple.com/pt/album/de-primeira/1591996084
